sentences.sContent: He is the best oar in the crew.
sentences.sContent_eng: He is the best oar in the crew.
sentences.sCn: 他是船员中最好的桨手。

sentences.sContent: The roaring oar hit the coarse keyboard on the cupboard aboard the boat.
sentences.sContent_eng: The roaring oar hit the coarse keyboard on the cupboard aboard the boat.
sentences.sCn: 轰鸣的桨击中了船上碗柜上的粗糙键盘。

sentences.sContent: Another development of oars into sweeps was due to lengthening the oar handle.
sentences.sContent_eng: Another development of oars into sweeps was due to lengthening the oar handle.
sentences.sCn: 桨的另一种演变途径是增长桨柄而成为梢。

trans.tranOther: a long pole with a wide flat blade at one end, used for rowing a boat
